definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: length of ark Ge 6:15 (P), of land of Canaan Ge 13:17 (J); most oft. of ark & other measurements in tabernacle & temple Ex 25:10, Ex 25:17, Ex 26:2, Ex 26:8, Ex 27:1, Ex 27:9 + (22 t. Ex, P), 1Ki 6:2, 1Ki 6:3, 1Ki 6:20 + (13 t. K & Ch), Ez Eze 40:7, Eze 40:11, Eze 40:18 + (41 t. Ez), etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[אַפַּיִם]] ´[[א]] forbearance, self-restraint, Pr 25:15.—(Ez Eze 31:7 LXX SyrVer Co rd. [[רׂב]] for [[אׂרֶךְ]], cf. v:Eze 31:5 where Co del. vb. [[ארך]]; Eze 41:22 rd. prob. [[אדנו]] LXX Sm, or [[אדניו]] Co = base.)
